model_input:

Relationship Description: Classmates A and Classmates B share a supportive and encouraging relationship. Classmates B understands how Classmates A feels and offers advice and support when needed. Classmates B advises Classmates A to take deep breaths and remember his material, reminding him that hard work will pay off. Event Description: Classmates A brought goods to Classmates B's house and thanked Classmates B for bringing them over. prediction:
